title: Add Google Analytics 4 gtag.js snippet to all pages

requirements.text: Insert the Google Analytics 4 gtag.js snippet (Measurement ID: G-73VJ1TQ3D7) into frontend/index.html immediately after the opening <head> tag. Ensure only one instance of the tag exists in the file.

quotes: Copy and paste it in the code of every page of your website, immediately after the <head> element. Don't add more than one Google tag to each page.

acceptanceCriteria: The gtag.js script tag with src 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-73VJ1TQ3D7' appears as the first child inside <head> in frontend/index.html
The inline gtag configuration script initializing dataLayer and calling gtag('config', 'G-73VJ1TQ3D7') is present immediately after the async gtag.js script tag
No duplicate Google tag snippets exist anywhere in frontend/index.html
All existing head content (SEO meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Card, Google Fonts, Google Sign-In script) is preserved and unmodified

constraints: Do not add more than one Google tag instance to the page
Do not modify any other part of the frontend beyond inserting the gtag snippet
The Measurement ID must be exactly G-73VJ1TQ3D7
nonGoals: Adding any other analytics or tracking solutions
Changing any existing SEO or meta tag configuration
